entertainment.headline: Censored before release: Diljit stands by Punjab 95 amid Sardaar Ji 3 backlashDiljit Dosanjh has refused to agree to the 127 cuts suggested by the censor board to his film 'Punjab 95', which is based on the real-life human rights activist Jaswant Singh Khalra. The actor now shared a strong note criticising the board for stifling the voice asking an uncomfortable question.

Badshah gears up for Paris Fashion Week debut, here's all you need to knowIndian rapper Badshah is all set to make history as he debuts at Paris Fashion Week 2026. Invited by luxury designer Mike Amiri, he will be the only Indian artist at the exclusive event, marking a significant milestone for Indian representation in global fashion.

Exclusive: Crushology 101 cast thinks India is warm hearted and beautifulCrushology 101 is a heartfelt university romance drama now streaming on Channel K in India, capturing the essence of youthful emotions and campus chaos. Nick Jonas feels lucky to have Priyanka Chopra, actor's sweet comment wins heartsNick Jonas's recent picture with wife Priyanka Chopra has left fans swooning over the two. Take a look at the photo here.

Kajol calls Ramoji Film City safe after facing backlash for haunted remarkBollywood actor Kajol, during the promotions of 'Maa', called Hyderabad's Ramoji Film City 'haunted'. Days after facing severe backlash, she clarified her remark.

Actor Vineet Kumar back home after being stuck in Dubai amid Middle East crisisActor Vineet Kumar Singh safely returned to Mumbai after being stranded at Dubai airport. This came amid emergency airspace closure in the Middle East.

Sunjay Kapur's sister shares emotional post: We didn't speak for 4 years due to egoLate businessman Sunjay Kapur's sister Mandhira shared an emotional note on Instagram on Sunday. She said that they hadn't spoken to each other for the last four years, and that she regretted not mending their relationship.

Kiara Advani in talks to play Meena Kumari in upcoming biopicActor Kiara Advani has been approached to play Meena Kumari in an upcoming biopic backed by Sidharth P Malhotra, Saregama, and the Amrohi family. Priyanka Chopra gives a shoutout to Nick Jonas after closing show of his Broadway playPriyanka Chopra cheered for husband Nick Jonas during his final Broadway performance of 'The Last Five Years'. Live: Netanyahu says Israel has achieved goal of removing Iranian nuke threatIsrael has claimed that Iran has launched continuous missile attacks despite US President Donald Trump announcing that the two countries had reached a ceasefire agreement early on Tuesday. Trump's announced that after nearly two weeks of military hostilities, Israel and Iran reached an agreement to stop an exchange of fire after what should be called a "12-day war ". 

However, Iran rejected Trump's claim, saying that no such agreement had been reached, saying Tehran will only stop fire if Israel first does so. Later, Iran's Foreign Minister Seyed Abbas Araghchi hinted at a ceasefire as he thanked his armed forces for "punishing Israel till the very last minute" till 4 am on Tuesday. Follow IndiaToday.in for latest updates.
